technology: There were no technical difficulties experienced by the participant.
cur_neg_affect: The participant mentions that he had to get the booster for his job, but doesn't express any strong negative affect.
past_neg_affect: The participant mentions that it was a little taxing for him because he likes to talk to people and have tangible feeling of interaction.
communal_orientation: The participant engages in conversation and asks questions, but doesn't give affirmations or seem entirely engaged.
engagement: The participant is engaged in the conversation and tries to keep it going.
defensiveness: The participant is not at all defensive in justifying their beliefs/perspective.
questions: Can you share about your first experience about COVID-19 and how you adapted with your work style according to that? (15:56)

booster_importance: The participant believes that boosters are somewhat important.
cognitive_complexity: The participant demonstrates a moderate amount of cognitive complexity by considering different perspectives and recognizing nuance.
general_notes: The participant is a bit skeptical about the vaccine and booster, but ultimately gets them because he wants to keep his job.
